name: Zombie Alarm
description:
Zombie Alarm! 2D shooter with zombies! 

It's a game about a zombie apocalypse (Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2).

• For better performance of the game try to download the standalone EXE version (Zombie_Alarm.zip).

Controls:

Left / Right  -  A / D

Jump  -  W / Space

Fire  -  Left mouse

Alt Fire  -  Right mouse
